data.title: About CircleCI
data.desc: The world’s best software teams deliver quality code, confidently, with CircleCI.

data.title: Get started in no time
data.desc: CircleCI’s free plan offers more build minutes than any free plan out there. Up to 6,000 build minutes/month and 30 jobs at a time.

data.title: Most customizable environments of any CI/CD provider
data.desc: Widest choice to customize operating systems, CPUs, GPUs, memory and images for each job. Build for Docker, Windows, Linux, Arm and macOS or build on your own compute with runners.

data.title: Fastest build times on the market
data.desc: Build times on CircleCI are 70% faster on average than competitors

data.title: The highest level of compliance and certification
data.desc: CircleCI is the only CI/CD platform that’s FedRAMP certified and SOC 2 Type II compliant. Built-in features like audit logs, restricted contexts, and LDAP give you complete control of your code.

data.title: Greater visibility throughout software development process
data.desc: CircleCI’s Insights dashboard gives visibility into workflow status, duration, credit consumption, and costs, for free.

data.title: SSH debugging
data.desc: Securely access any job to CircleCI to debug builds and tests in real time.

data.title: Auto-test splitting
data.desc: Shorten the feedback loop by automatically splitting your tests across parallel instances of the same job.

data.title: Now supporting GitHub Checks
data.desc: See the status of your CircleCI workflows and related jobs all within the GitHub UI. Enable this feature in your CircleCI organization settings for new and existing accounts.

Pricing.title: Free
Pricing.desc: Free for both open source and private projects
setup: Up to 6,000 build minutes per month
Largest selection: Build for Docker, Windows, Linux, Arm, and macOS or on your own compute with self-hosted runners
Build better: Choose the right resource class size (S⁠–⁠L) to go fast and maximize your build minutes
Fast: Run up to 30 jobs at a time and run your tests in parallel using test splitting

data.title: Ensure that your code meets quality standards
data.desc: CodeFactor instantly performs Code Review with every GitHub Commit or PR. Zero setup time. Get actionable feedback within seconds. Customize rules, get refactoring tips and ignore irrelevant issues.

data.title: Languages
data.desc: Bash, C, C#, C++, CoffeeScript, CSS, Dockerfile, Go, Groovy, Java, JS, Kotlin, Less, PHP, Python, Ruby, Scala, SCSS, Sugar SS, Swift, TypeScript and YAML.

data.title: Autofix
data.desc: Autofix certain reported issues on-demand or automatically.

data.title: For developers by developers.
data.desc: Integrate in seconds. Toggle inspection for any branch on the fly. Get actionable refactoring tips. We use it ourselves.

data.title: Get the big picture. Identify HotSpots.
data.desc: Track entire code base, raise visibility and understand code quality of the whole project. Dig into commits and the most problematic files.

data.title: Greater visibility throughout software development process
data.desc: CircleCI’s Insights dashboard gives visibility into workflow status, duration, credit consumption, and costs, for free.

data.title: Integrate into your workflow
data.desc: See actionable results within GitHub pull request. Comment or open a GitHub Issue directly from CodeFactor's Code Review page. Keep team updated via Slack integration.

data.title: Manage quality over time.
data.desc: Be a part of a great team, seize the leaderboard.

Pricing.title: Pro MAX (5 private repos) Free Trial
Pricing.desc: 5 private, unlimited public repos. Unlimited users.

Pricing.desc: 20 private, unlimited public repos. Unlimited users.

Pricing.desc: 50 private, unlimited public repos. Unlimited users.

Pricing.title: Pro MAX (100 private repos) Free Trial
Pricing.desc: 100 private, unlimited public repos. Unlimited users.

Pricing.title: Pro MAX (200 private repos) Free Trial
Pricing.desc: 200 private, unlimited public repos. Unlimited users.
